hours_text:
# Visit

* * *

THE ART CENTER

...is the main location, which houses over 3,300 square feet of galleries, a 2,700 square feet education wing, and administrative offices.

**Admission to the galleries is always free!  
Tours available**

**Hours:**  
Monday & Tuesday by appointment   
Wednesday-Saturday | 10 am - 5 pm  
Sunday | 10 am - 2 pm  
  
242 S. Santa Fe Ave.  
Salina, KS 67401  
785.827.1431

THE ART CENTER CINEMA

...opened in 1997 is a sixty-nine seat theater for first run independent, documentary, and international films.

**View film schedule**[**here**](/now-playing)

**Hours:**   
Friday | 6 pm  
Saturday & Sunday | 2 pm & 6 pm  
Monday | 6 pm

**Tickets:**  
Members $8  
Seniors & students w/valid ID $10  
Non-members $12  
  
150 S. Santa Fe Ave.   
Salina, KS 67401  
785.827.1431

THE WAREHOUSE AND EDUCATION STUDIO

...is a 4,500 square feet living and working space for artists-in-residence and education studio for all of our art classes.

[**Become an Open Studio Member for key fob access to work on your art!**](/become-a-member)

149 S. 4th St.   
Salina, KS 67401

[ Visit our YouTube for artist talks, interviews, and more! ](https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCuoJbrCLtlMFYFqP8x86trQ?view_as=subscriber)

[ ](https://www.salinaartcenter.org/garden-gala)

[**GALA & FASHION SHOW TICKETS ON SALE NOW**](/garden-gala)

Saturday, January 31 | Hilton Garden Inn. This event is not a sit down dinner this year! There will be heavy hors d'oeuvres, open bars and dessert stations.  
Tickets are $100 per person. [RSVP](https://wl.donorperfect.net/weblink/WebLink.aspx?name=E356665&id=55)

[ ](https://artist.callforentry.org/festivals_unique_info.php?ID=16354)

[**2026 MOUNTAIN PLAINS BIENNIAL CALL FOR ENTRY**](https://artist.callforentry.org/festivals_unique_info.php?ID=16354)

Open to visual artists working in **Colorado, Kansas, Montana, Nebraska, New Mexico, North Dakota, Oklahoma, South Dakota, Texas, and Wyoming.**[**Learn more.**](/call-for-artists)

[ ](/comingsoon)

**NOW PLAYING:_The Choral_**[**tickets**](/cinema)

* * *

## creating exchanges among art, artists & audiences that reveal life!

* * *

[ ]()

ART & COFFEE

Every Third Saturday of the Month | 10 AM-Noon | FREE  
This monthly event is free and open to all visual artists who want to connect to other visual artists. All artists of any medium, of all skill levels, and at any stage of your artistic career are welcome. Whether you're here to share, learn, or just enjoy some great coffee and conversation, we’d love to see you there! Coffee will be provided.

[ ](/tell-me-what-you-think-of-me)

**_Tell Me What You Think of Me_ | Ann Resnick**

**Opening Reception |** First Friday, February 6 • 5–7 pm
